description:
Hades 2 might be in early access, but it’s chock full of enemies to beat, gods to meet, and secrets to seek…out. If you’re just jumping into the roguelike for the first time, there are several things you are going to want to know to make your runs more successful -- things the game itself doesn’t tell you. And if you’re coming into the sequel from the first game, you can still benefit from this guide because there are plenty of additions to the Hades formula here. Let’s break it down.

00:00 - Intro
00:34 - Give Nectar, Get Prizes
01:14 - The Olympic Pool
01:40 - Types of Boons
02:34 - Double Boon Rooms
03:04 - Armored Enemies
03:31 - Canceling Attacks
03:55 - Changing Fate
04:26 - Increasing Grasp
04:49 - Taking Advantage of Traps
05:15 - Understanding Timers
05:37 - Saving & Quitting

For more on Hades 2, check out our Wiki guide at https://www.ign.com/wikis/hades-2

#IGN #Gaming #Hades2
title: Hades 2 - 11 Things The Game Doesn’t Tell You

description:
Homeworld 3 Single-Player Campaign reviewed by Dan Stapleton on PC.
Homeworld 3’s campaign goes out of its way to change up the style of missions we fight our way through as Imogen S’jet seeks out a missing Hiigaran fleet and faces an unhinged enemy. The resulting battle of wills feels more consequential than the off-screen galactic threat behind it. Relatively close-quarters scenarios have you guiding dozens of ships through eye catching gauntlets of asteroids and enormous space stations, and the dogfights and capital ship slug-fests that play out are a sight to behold. Being able to pause time and give orders makes managing your fleet much less overwhelming, especially given the tricky controls and sometimes disobedient friendly ship AI. Straightforward tech upgrades and a limited selection of ship types limit the campaign’s replayability, but building an armada and watching it tear through the enemy is always a satisfying sci-fi light show.
title: Homeworld 3 Single-Player Campaign Review

description:
Meet your companions and learn about their abilities in this launch trailer for Cryptmaster, a narrative adventure game where your words are your power. Cryptmaster is available now on PC (via Steam, GOG, and Epic Games Store).

In Cryptmaster, say anything to control the world around you but be careful as bodies you control might not hold together as well as when you were alive. The freakish and proud builder of the crypts known as the Cryptmaster leads your journey in the underground catacombs to aid in your usage of your words to fight toadmen, heal your frail bodies, and find letters to remember your abilities.
title: Cryptmaster - Official Launch Trailer
Here’s your guide to weapons in Helldivers 2! Presented by @McDonalds

description: Witness the abyss before you. Check out the latest trailer for Street Fighter 6 to get a deep dive into Akuma, including a breakdown of the character's abilities, special moves, and more. Akuma joins the Street Fighter 6 roster on May 22, 2024.
title: Street Fighter 6 - Official Character Guide: Akuma Trailer

description:
Here's another peek at Amanda the Adventurer 2 in this latest teaser for the upcoming horror adventure sequel. Amanda the Adventurer 2 will be available on PC in 2024, and a demo is coming during Steam Next Fest on June 10-17. 

Amanda the Adventurer 2 follows Riley Park, who, after seeing what was contained on the mysterious tapes in their attic, travels to the Kensdale Public Library to investigate further. Upon arriving, they're greeted by a masked figure who claims to know their Aunt Kate, before she died and needs their help finding something Aunt Kate had left in the library. They also warn of a powerful entity that seems to be drawn to the tapes.

Meanwhile, Amanda is now aware of Riley's presence, and is doing everything to find a way to free herself. Suddenly, the stakes are higher than ever before, as it's not just Amanda looking for Riley now.
title: Amanda the Adventurer 2 - Official Teaser Trailer

description:
Quest Master is a dungeon-designing sandbox adventure game developed by Skydevilpalm. Players will embark on story-rich adventures and skill-testing obstacle courses as Lanze, Javelynn and Shiv — the hero, heroine, and furry sidekick. Construct multi-tiered dungeons filled with levers, timed switches, moving platforms, and more to your exact specifications. Utilize a trusty sword, a long-range bow, wall-shattering bombs, attack-augmenting magical rings, and more to gain the upper hand against enemies on your venture.

Quest Master is launching into Steam Early Access on May 29 for PC with an expanded and updated demo available now.

#QuestMaster #Gaming #IGN
title: Quest Master - Official Early Access Release Date Trailer

title: David Leitch Picks a Favorite Shot From Each of His Movies (Deadpool 2, John Wick) | My Best Shots

description:
Check out the Rite Here Rite Now trailer for the upcoming debut film from the rock band, Ghost. 

Rite Here Rite Now was shot over the course of Ghost’s two sold-out shows at Los Angeles’ hallowed Kia Forum. Ghost's debut feature film combines live performance from the two-night finale of the band’s RE-IMPERATOUR U.S.A. 2023 with a narrative story that picks up plot threads from the band’s long-running Chapters series. 

Rite Here Rite Now is directed by Ghost’s Tobias Forge and Alex Ross Perry and is produced by Popecorn Cinematic Pictures. Producers include Kristen Mulderig, Rick Sales, Craig Butta and Jonas Åkerlund.

Rite Here Rite Now will be in cinemas worldwide on June 20 and June 22 only.

#Ghost #Music #Trailer
title: Ghost: Rite Here Rite Now - Official Trailer (2024) Tobias Forge

description: Scanline VFX, an Emmy Award-winning visual effects house, has unveiled its breakdown reel for Netflix's debut season of Avatar: The Last Airbender. The reel showcases breathtaking environmental designs, including the icy city of Agna Qel’a, and stunning water battles featuring Whalezilla (aka Koi-zilla) facing off against the Fire Nation's soldiers and navy ships. The series has already secured renewal for its second and third seasons.
title: Avatar: The Last Airbender - Official VFX Breakdown
